trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A workflow instance may be terminated in one of three ways: the host may call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> activity may be invoked from inside the workflow instance, or the workflow runtime engine may terminate the instance because of an unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]다음 세 가지 방법 중 하나에 워크플로 인스턴스가 종료 될 수 있습니다: 호스트를 호출할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>활동이 워크플로 인스턴스 내부에서 호출 또는 워크플로 런타임 엔진이 처리 되지 않은 예외로 인해 인스턴스를 종료할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the workflow instance is terminated, the workflow runtime engine raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 런타임 엔진에서 발생 워크플로 인스턴스가 종료 되 면는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated?displayProperty=fullName>이벤트.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The host may subscribe to this event by adding an event handler to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 호스트와 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated?displayProperty=fullName>사이로</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated?displayProperty=fullName> 이벤트 처리기를 추가 하 여이 이벤트를 구독할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception that caused the workflow instance to be terminated.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 인스턴스가 종료 되 게 한 예외를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: When the workflow instance is terminated because of an unhandled exception, Exception contains the unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: 처리 되지 않은 예외로 인해 워크플로 인스턴스가 종료 되 면 처리 되지 않은 예외가 포함 하는 예외입니다.

trans-unit.source: When the workflow instance is terminated by either a host call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or by a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> activity, Exception contains a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException> that has its <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to a description of the reason for the termination.
trans-unit.target: 한 호스트 호출이 워크플로 인스턴스가 종료 되는 경우 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>또는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>작업 예외에 포함 되어는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException>있는 해당 <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>속성이 종료 이유에 대 한 설명으로 설정 합니다.</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the host terminates the workflow instance, it supplies this description in the `string` parameter to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 이 설명을 제공 호스트가 워크플로 인스턴스를 종료 하는 경우는 `string` <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 매개 변수

trans-unit.source: If the workflow instance is terminated by a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>, the description is supplied by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity.Error%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity.Error%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity.Error%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 에서 설명을 제공는,</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> 워크플로 인스턴스가 종료 되는 경우

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although in the case of a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated?displayProperty=fullName> event that is not due to an unhandled exception, the workflow runtime engine encapsulates a description of the reason for the termination in the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException>, it does not necessarily throw this exception.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >의 경우에 있지만 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated?displayProperty=fullName>처리 되지 않은 예외 때문이 아닌 이벤트를 워크플로 런타임 엔진에서 종료 이유에 대 한 설명을 캡슐화는 <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>속성은 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException>, 반드시이 예외를 throw 하지 않습니다.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException> </xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception> that caused the workflow instance to be terminated.
